name: Apple & Key
description:
APPLE & KEY is an uncomfortable tale of finding yourself in
a strange land, with strange characters. Who will you trust?

Existing features:

- A puzzle that needs to be to be solved!
- Audio conversations with strange characters!
- Simple pixel art!
- 7 different endings!
- Windows compatible!

Controls:
- Movement - WASD or Arrow Keys
- Confirm - E or Enter
- Cancel - Q or Escape
- Running - Shift

Dear Youtuber/Streamer, please post a link to your video/streams
here on itch.io or message me on itch.io I would love to see your
reaction/commentary.

/// THANK YOU FOR PLAYING APPLE & KEY ///
